PHRASE.LANG: This egg is never sunny side up. Always hard boiled so you don’t want to get on its bad side [#Legal]
Cet oeuf est jamais sunny side up. Toujours difficile bouillir si vous ne voulez pas d'obtenir sur son mauvais côté [#Legal]
This egg is never sunny side up. Always hard boiled so you don’t want to get on its bad side [#Legal]
